headline: Why ServiceNow Stock Is Gaining Today
summary: ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW) stock is moving higher in Tuesday's trading.  The software specialist's share price was up 1.9% as of 2:30 p.m. ET, and been up as much as 3.1% earlier in the day.  Two investment firms updated their valuation forecasts for ServiceNow today and lowered their respective price targets on the stock.
